message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_FV_REQUESTEDBYID
message.locale: The case participant role identifier of the requester must be specified.

message.name: INF_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_ATTACHMENTDESCRIPTION
message.locale: Hearing Transcription.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_TRANSCRIBERMISSING
message.locale: Transcriber details must be provided.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATEREQUESTEDINVALID
message.locale: The requested date must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATESENTINVALID
message.locale: The date sent to transcriber must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATESENTBEFOREDATEREQUESTED
message.locale: The date sent to transcriber must not be before the requested date.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATESENTTOREQUESTERINVALID
message.locale: The date sent to requester must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATESENTTOREQUESTERBEFOREDATEREQ
message.locale: The date sent to requester must not be before the requested date.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATESENTTOREQUESTERBEFOREDATESENT
message.locale: The date sent to requester must not be before the date sent to transcriber.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATERECFROMTRANSINVALID
message.locale: The date received from transcriber must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATERECFROMTRANSBEFOREDATEREQ
message.locale: The date received from transcriber must not be before the requested date.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATERECFROMTRANSBEFOREDATESNTTOTRANS
message.locale: The date received from transcriber must not be before the date sent to transcriber.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATERECFROMTRANSBEFOREDATESNTTOREQ
message.locale: The date received from transcriber must be on or before the date sent to requester.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATEDUEINPAST
message.locale: The due date must not be in the past.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATEDUEINVALID
message.locale: The due date should be on or after the scheduled date of the hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATEDUEBEFOREREQUESTEDDATE
message.locale: The due date should be on or after the requested date.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_TRANSCRIPTIONNOTATTACHED
message.locale: There is no transcription attached.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_CANNOTSEND
message.locale: Cannot send transcription to transcriber until the hearing has been held.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATEBEFORESCHEDULED
message.locale: The date sent to transcriber must be on after the scheduled hearing date.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATERECEIVEDFROMTRANSNOTNULL
message.locale: Cannot specify a date received from transcriber if a date sent to transcriber is not specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGTRANSCRIPTIONREQUEST_DATESENTTOREQUESTERNOTNULL
message.locale: Cannot specify a date sent to requester if a date received from transcriber is not specified.
